education_history.institution: State University of New York at Buffalo

education_history.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communications

technical_skills: Cloud AWS (EC2, S3, RDS), Azure, Snowflake
Libraries Pandas, NumPy, FastAI, Matplotlib, Seaborn, TensorFlow, Scikit-learn
Languages Python, SQL, R, Bash, SAS, Stata
Tools Power BI, Hadoop, Spark, Tableau

responsibilities: Designed and implemented advanced transformer-based models for text-to-text processing.
Integrated natural language understanding (NLU) and natural language generation (NLG) capabilities into the system.
Developed AI-driven chatbots and virtual assistants capable of understanding complex technical inquiries.
Optimized data pipelines by developing and implementing SQL queries and stored procedures.
Resolved real-time database issues under pressure, reducing downtime by 15%.
Enhanced operational efficiency by streamlining payment reversal processes and billing workflows.
Demonstrated adaptability and problem-solving skills during early-stage project implementation.

projects.title: Property Price Forecast
projects.description: Hand-picked a diverse dataset to predict house prices, showcasing strong technical skills in data preprocessing and cloud technologies. Leveraged my programming knowledge to implement machine learning models (Linear Regression, Random Forest) which achieved an accuracy of 87%. Demonstrated proficiency in deploying the model using Docker, emphasizing soft skills like attention to detail and problem-solving. Achieved these results through rigorous EDA and PCA analysis.

projects.title: Customer Segmentation
projects.description: Designed a robust database solution leveraging PostgreSQL to enhance data retrieval speed by 30%, demonstrating strong technical skills and programming knowledge. Integrated cloud-based Power BI for advanced reporting and analytics, showcasing exceptional soft skills in collaboration and problem-solving.

projects.title: Optimizing Library Management
projects.description:
Developed a robust cloud-based library management system leveraging advanced PostgreSQL database skills to enhance scalability and performance. Demonstrated strong technical acumen by integrating referential integrity, concurrent access controls, and enhanced security measures. Leveraged Power BI for comprehensive reporting and analytics, thereby significantly improving data-driven decision-making processes. Demonstrated exceptional problem-solving abilities through the seamless transition from Excel to a sophisticated cloud technology platform.

projects.title: Wireless Sensor Networks with Fuzzy Ant Colony Optimization
projects.description:
Analyzed network traffic and implemented energy-efficient routing strategies using cloud technologies like Graph Neural Networks (GNNs). Developed robust solutions leveraging technical skills in programming languages like Python, JavaScript. Enhanced system performance by 20% through innovative optimization algorithms. Demonstrated strong problem-solving abilities and soft skills to tackle complex challenges in wireless sensor networks.
        
        Implemented cutting-edge techniques, including ant colony optimization and fuzzy logic, using cloud technologies for optimal data routing strategies. Leveraged extensive programming knowledge to design efficient energy-saving solutions. Achieved a 20% improvement in system performance, showcasing strong technical skills and problem-solving abilities. Demonstrated adaptability and collaboration through effective communication of complex ideas.
